citation.case_name: Pre-Paid Legal Services, Inc. v. Bradley Pre-Paid Legal Services, Inc. v. Brownlow and Pre-Paid Legal Services, Inc. v. Mealey

html:
543 U.S. 1000

PRE-PAID LEGAL SERVICES, INC., ET AL.
v.
BRADLEY ET AL.;
PRE-PAID LEGAL SERVICES, INC., ET AL.
v.
BROWNLOW ET AL.; and
PRE-PAID LEGAL SERVICES, INC., ET AL.
v.
MEALEY ET AL.

No. 04-364.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 29, 2004.

1

Sup. Ct. Miss. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 874 So. 2d 972 (second judgment) and 984 (first judgment); 875 So. 2d 1075 (third judgment).
